ya5.3.4:1.1_0: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ pajahitthāti? No.
ya5.3.4:2.1_0: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ pajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ parijānātīti? No.
ya5.3.4:3.1_0: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya5.3.4:4.1_0: Arahā dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti, no ca samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha.
ya5.3.4:4.1_1: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahittha.
ya5.3.4:5.1_0: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya5.3.4:6.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti.
ya5.3.4:6.1_1: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā samudayasaccañca nappajahittha dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti.
